name: Candy Run
description:
Candy Run is an infinite Runner game where you collect candy!
Mouse Click is Jump, The longer you hold, the higher you jump.

If you have the Wings you can hold Right Click to glide. and left click to flap.

You only get 1 extra flap per level of wings


The Bubble power-up will destroy spikes and keep you safe.
For each level of bubble power-up it will destroy 1 spike.

The Magnet will pull candy towards you like magic! for each level of magnet you will pull more valuable candy towards you!


See what is the highest score you can get.

All that is left, is leaderboards and some menu improvements. Feedback is appreciated.
